effect.red_blue: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.yellow: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.red_green_japan: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.blue_japan: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.red_blue: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
